content.p: Use these pages to help you find job vacancies and ace the recruitment process. Each page provides tailored advice for postgraduate researchers and specific advice for roles within academia or industry. Find sources of vacancies for jobs within academia and beyond Read about creating a targeted version of your CV for each role A well written covering letter will demonstrate your suitability for a role Application forms are challenging and help is at hand Find out about how to prepare for interviews and use our free resources Explore what happens at an assessment centre and how to prepare telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
